html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-04482025-03-20NRCAN
ActEnergy Efficiency Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Energy Efficiency Regulations, 2016 (Amendment 18)
PrecisRegulations Amending the ENERGY EFFICIENCY REGULATIONS, 2016 (AMENDMENT 18) in order to (1) add the following products into the Regulations: air compressors, faucets, line voltage thermostats, pool pumps and showerheads; (2) expand the scope of what is defined as a general service lamp and introduce or update energy efficiency and testing standards to harmonize with U.S. standards for the following products specifically: air conditioners, heat pumps, gas furnaces, electric water heaters and general service lamps; and (3) expand the use of ambulatory incorporation by reference and update the list of energy-using products that can be amended through Ministerial Regulations for the purpose of maintaining harmonization.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0110 Publication Date: 2025-04-09
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the ENERGY EFFICIENCY REGULATIONS, 2016 (AMENDMENT 18) in order to (1) add the following products into the Regulations: air compressors, faucets, line voltage thermostats, pool pumps and showerheads;  (2) expand the scope of what is defined as a general service lamp and introduce or update energy efficiency and testing standards to harmonize with U.S. standards for the following products specifically: air conditioners, heat pumps, gas furnaces, electric water heaters and general service lamps; and (3) expand the use of ambulatory incorporation by reference and update the list of energy-using products that can be amended through Ministerial Regulations for the purpose of maintaining harmonization.
